Dear Hagop,

 

Greetings.

 

Insurer has requested the below details.

*	Breakdown of the quotation identifying the actual area of the damages (sqft/ssqm).
*	Full photos of the affected carpet
*	Original installation invoice
*	Photos of the source of water leakage causing damage to the carpet

Further insurer has stated that regardless of how small or big the claim is, the policy is subject to LM7 wordings, where it requires the insured to notify us in writing within 15 days, and that no claim under this policy shall be payable unless the terms of these conditions have been complied with.

 



 

Thanking you.

 

Best Regards,
